error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
lateBoundMethodNameAssigmentJS.js(1,17): error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
lateBoundMethodNameAssigmentJS.js(4,39): error TS2339: Property 'bind' does not exist on type '() => error'.
lateBoundMethodNameAssigmentJS.js(7,11): error TS2697: An async function or method must return a 'Promise'. Make sure you have a declaration for 'Promise' or include 'ES2015' in your '--lib' option.

==== lateBoundMethodNameAssigmentJS.js (3 errors) ====
    const _symbol = Symbol("_sym");
                    ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
    export class MyClass {
        constructor() {
            this[_symbol] = this[_symbol].bind(this);
                                          ~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'bind' does not exist on type '() => error'.
        }
    
        async [_symbol]() { }
              ~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2697: An async function or method must return a 'Promise'. Make sure you have a declaration for 'Promise' or include 'ES2015' in your '--lib' option.
    }
